About

Welcome to my site! I am a Mechanical Engineering/Robotics Ph.D. researcher, specializing in optimization methods, control theory, dynamics, machine learning, and numerical methods. I have extensive research, leadership, and teaching experience with a rigorous mathematical background and hands-on experiments with robotic fish. I am an nthusiastic team player with an interest in the nexus of science, research, and management/business.
